divs: Sighting Details1. Went to my deck to smoke.2. Duck92s in the air at 1100 PM strange I looked up.3. What the hell is that. Could not comprehend what it was.4. Absolute fear. I have never seen anything like this. Absolute fear.5. Cannot make exact shape. Triangle. Moved N to S very slow 200 above trees.Had low glow neon yellowred like liquor store lights can see through object. Cansee through lights and shape. Very freighting. Cannot explain feeling. Never hadthis type of feeling before.6. Was so frightened went in to house. Asked neibour the next day if he sawobject he said no and asked what I was talking about. I told him that there werelow fly air plains and did he see them. Did not want to explain what I had seen.
